description: Curated SMART attribute reference for top 30 drive manufacturers. Attributes listed are common SMART IDs with short descriptions. Vendor-specific mappings/notes are included where public documentation exists. This is a best-effort reference assembled from public sources (Wikipedia, smartmontools, vendor SMART docs such as Seagate, Western Digital, Samsung, Intel, Kioxia, Solidigm).

common_attributes_reference.name: Read Error Rate
common_attributes_reference.description: Count of hardware read errors that occurred when reading data from the disk.

common_attributes_reference.name: Spin-Up Time
common_attributes_reference.description: Average time the drive takes to spin up to full speed (HDDs). For SSDs typically fixed/unused.

common_attributes_reference.name: Reallocated Sector Count
common_attributes_reference.description: Count of sectors the drive has remapped (reallocated) due to read/write errors.

common_attributes_reference.name: Power-On Hours
common_attributes_reference.description: Total number of hours the drive has been powered on since manufacture.

common_attributes_reference.name: Power Cycle Count
common_attributes_reference.description: Number of times the drive has been power-cycled.

common_attributes_reference.name: Temperature Celsius
common_attributes_reference.description: Current drive temperature (usually in degrees Celsius).

common_attributes_reference.name: Reallocation Event Count / Offline Uncorrectable (vendor variants)
common_attributes_reference.description: Count of reallocation events or related offline errors; vendor semantics vary.

common_attributes_reference.name: Current Pending Sector Count / Probational Count (vendor variants)
common_attributes_reference.description: Number of unstable (pending) sectors waiting to be reallocated if write/verify fails.

common_attributes_reference.name: Offline Uncorrectable / Unrecoverable Sector Count
common_attributes_reference.description: Count of uncorrectable errors found during off-line scans; strongly correlated with imminent failure.

common_attributes_reference.name: UDMA CRC Error Count / Interface CRC Errors
common_attributes_reference.description: Interface CRC errors (e.g., cabling/connection errors) on ATA/SATA links.

common_attributes_reference.name: Write Error Rate (vendor-specific)
common_attributes_reference.description: Vendor-specific write error related metric; semantics differ between vendors.

common_attributes_reference.name: Vendor Specific 240
common_attributes_reference.description: Often used for vendor-specific health metrics (e.g., spare counts, NAND life) especially on SSDs.

common_attributes_reference.name: Total LBAs Written (or Vendor-specific)
common_attributes_reference.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs written (wear metric); vendor format varies.

common_attributes_reference.name: Total LBAs Read (or Vendor-specific)
common_attributes_reference.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs read; vendor format varies.

manufacturers.name: Seagate
manufacturers.notes: Seagate publishes SMART attribute guidance and has several vendor-specific attributes beyond the 'common' list. See Seagate/OpenSeaChest reference.

attributes.name: Read Error Rate
attributes.description: Count of hardware read errors that occurred when reading data from the disk.

attributes.name: Spin-Up Time
attributes.description: Average time the drive takes to spin up to full speed (HDDs). For SSDs typically fixed/unused.

attributes.name: Start/Stop Count
attributes.description: Number of start/stop cycles (load/unload events).

attributes.name: Reallocated Sector Count
attributes.description: Count of sectors the drive has remapped (reallocated) due to read/write errors.

attributes.name: Power-On Hours
attributes.description: Total number of hours the drive has been powered on since manufacture.

attributes.description: Number of times the drive has been power-cycled.

attributes.description: Current drive temperature (usually in degrees Celsius).

attributes.description: Number of unstable (pending) sectors waiting to be reallocated if write/verify fails.

attributes.name: Offline Uncorrectable / Unrecoverable Sector Count
attributes.description: Count of uncorrectable errors found during off-line scans; strongly correlated with imminent failure.

attributes.name: UDMA CRC Error Count / Interface CRC Errors
attributes.description: Interface CRC errors (e.g., cabling/connection errors) on ATA/SATA links.

attributes.description: Vendor-specific write error related metric; semantics differ between vendors.

attributes.name: Vendor Specific 240
attributes.description: Often used for vendor-specific health metrics (e.g., spare counts, NAND life) especially on SSDs.

attributes.name: Total LBAs Written (or Vendor-specific)
attributes.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs written (wear metric); vendor format varies.

attributes.name: Total LBAs Read (or Vendor-specific)
attributes.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs read; vendor format varies.

manufacturers.name: Western Digital
manufacturers.notes: WD documents a specific subset of SMART attributes for WD SATA drives (support article). WD also owns SanDisk and HGST brands; mappings may be shared or vendor-specific.

manufacturers.name: Toshiba / Kioxia

attributes.description: Current drive temperature (usually in degrees Celsius).

attributes.name: Reallocation Event Count / Offline Uncorrectable (vendor variants)
attributes.description: Count of reallocation events or related offline errors; vendor semantics vary.

attributes.name: Current Pending Sector Count / Probational Count (vendor variants)
attributes.description: Number of unstable (pending) sectors waiting to be reallocated if write/verify fails.

attributes.name: Offline Uncorrectable / Unrecoverable Sector Count
attributes.description: Count of uncorrectable errors found during off-line scans; strongly correlated with imminent failure.

attributes.name: UDMA CRC Error Count / Interface CRC Errors
attributes.description: Interface CRC errors (e.g., cabling/connection errors) on ATA/SATA links.

attributes.name: Write Error Rate (vendor-specific)
attributes.description: Vendor-specific write error related metric; semantics differ between vendors.

attributes.name: Vendor Specific 240
attributes.description: Often used for vendor-specific health metrics (e.g., spare counts, NAND life) especially on SSDs.

attributes.name: Total LBAs Written (or Vendor-specific)

attributes.name: Total LBAs Read (or Vendor-specific)
attributes.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs read; vendor format varies.

manufacturers.name: OCZ (Toshiba legacy)
manufacturers.notes: OCZ brand/property moved through acquisitions; many OCZ-era SSDs used vendor-specific attributes later absorbed into Toshiba/Kioxia or other parent documentation.

attributes.name: Read Error Rate
attributes.description: Count of hardware read errors that occurred when reading data from the disk.

attributes.name: Spin-Up Time
attributes.description: Average time the drive takes to spin up to full speed (HDDs). For SSDs typically fixed/unused.

attributes.name: Start/Stop Count
attributes.description: Number of start/stop cycles (load/unload events).

attributes.name: Reallocated Sector Count
attributes.description: Count of sectors the drive has remapped (reallocated) due to read/write errors.

attributes.name: Power-On Hours
attributes.description: Total number of hours the drive has been powered on since manufacture.

attributes.name: Power Cycle Count
attributes.description: Number of times the drive has been power-cycled.

attributes.name: Temperature Celsius
attributes.description: Current drive temperature (usually in degrees Celsius).

attributes.name: Reallocation Event Count / Offline Uncorrectable (vendor variants)
attributes.description: Count of reallocation events or related offline errors; vendor semantics vary.

attributes.name: Current Pending Sector Count / Probational Count (vendor variants)
attributes.description: Number of unstable (pending) sectors waiting to be reallocated if write/verify fails.

attributes.name: Offline Uncorrectable / Unrecoverable Sector Count
attributes.description: Count of uncorrectable errors found during off-line scans; strongly correlated with imminent failure.

attributes.name: UDMA CRC Error Count / Interface CRC Errors
attributes.description: Interface CRC errors (e.g., cabling/connection errors) on ATA/SATA links.

attributes.name: Write Error Rate (vendor-specific)
attributes.description: Vendor-specific write error related metric; semantics differ between vendors.

attributes.name: Vendor Specific 240
attributes.description: Often used for vendor-specific health metrics (e.g., spare counts, NAND life) especially on SSDs.

attributes.name: Total LBAs Written (or Vendor-specific)
attributes.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs written (wear metric); vendor format varies.

attributes.name: Total LBAs Read (or Vendor-specific)
attributes.description: On many SSDs this reports total host LBAs read; vendor format varies.

manufacturers.name: Apacer
manufacturers.notes: No vendor-public exhaustive SMART attribute table located during curation; drive uses common SMART attributes but manufacturer may also include vendor-specific attributes. Consult vendor utilities for official lists.
